Our Judges Selected Some of The Most Groundbreaking Technology at Interop 2008, Including Overall Best of Show Windows Azure is in a great place, and Amitabh Srivastava is ready to move to a new phase in his career. He has done stellar work for the company and I will work to ensure a smooth transition with the Windows Azure team, said Steve Ballmer . It's thought that Amitabh Srivastava 's exit is connected to Microsoft's announcement that company veteran Satya Nadella would replace Bob Muglia as head of Server and Tools. He is an ideal business leader to chair the President's Council on Jobs and Competitiveness and help drive a focus on what we can all do to increase American competitiveness and create new jobs. will be the next speaker in the World Within Reach Speaker Series, which has also featured Colin Powell , Karl Rove , Howard Dean , and most recently, Barbara Walters . The Speaker Series is an initiative by the SA to bring engaging speakers in public affairs, entertainment, and business to the University at Albany to gain insight from their unique perspective. So far all speakers have had a political background, with the exception of Barbara Walters , a journalist.
